Articles.Content: I just tried to launch KSP from my desktop <got it from steam> and it said: you are about to INSTALL KSP. okay, did I miss an update or something?
No you didn't miss anything, the game hasn't even gotten through QA and experimentals, so we're not yet there. You might've moved your KSP install.

Nope; there will be an announcement, both here and on the main website. I'm not quite sure what would cause Steam to do that--I'm one of those old-school types who downloaded KSP from the main site.EDIT: Ninja'd by Stupid_chris himself...
Same issue here, although directing the install to the existing directory seemed to fix it. Perhaps a steam update?

Development -> Q&A Testing -> Experimentals -> Release.

They're still developing stuff.
I hit the 'install' button from steam, and it instantly fixed it, was odd lol, but it works still, my mods too XD
